column5:
ANOTHER example of deflection by avoiding questions about Jews.

Why?

Those statements are verifiably true.

How can those truthful statements be anti-Semitic, unless you have been educated to think the truth is anti-Semitic?

And, you avoided the original question.

Whites do this avoidance thing ALL the time. It's almost like they are scared of something but won't say it.

Even when the posts are verifiably true people call them anti-Semitic (code for counter-Semitic)

But never, ever will a white person speak out against someone being anti-White.

I'll give you an example:

When I ask, "What is it about Jewish behavior that causes a rise in anti-Semitism" no one White person will be rational and say, "True. Jewish behavior does influence anti-Semitism."
The truth offends and triggers most **CULTURAL MARXIST / EGALITARIAN** Christians.

Education is rigged for profit.

Get out of it and fight the system by exposing the lies.

I am 3 plus years into my book. That's all I've got for me in my life.

No one to check it either.

I want to publish it, but I can't trust anyone to check it.

I feel at the end. I have no money, and I refuse to take welfare too.

Jews fear him uniting Whites. (That means Holoco$t in a Jew's brain)

And Jews own most MSM.

Remember: Capitalism and Communism: two sides of the same shekel.
Americans have mastered the art of sensationalizing the most material and mindless BS ever known.

Yep.
